general_feeling: People would look at you, and people who knows me would be asking questions. It would be better if it doesn't hurt my ears when wearing them continuesly.
challenges: Hurts my ears when wearing them non-stop. I lay down or lean-back to something for support my head so that the glasses pressure is not entirely on me.
act_impact: When I need to change or wash-up, I need to take it off and remember to put it back on.
beh_adapt: I have been moving less and stay still a little bit more.
social: Friends and colleagues have been asking questions.
improvements: Lighter and softer. Less pressure on the head or ears would be great.
